headline: American Water Charitable Foundation Awards Over $1.5 Million through 2025 Water and Environment Grant Program
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., April 22, 2025--The American Water Charitable Foundation, a philanthropic non-profit organization established by American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., announced on Earth Day, that it awarded a combined total of $1,650,510 to 79 organizations in 12 states, supporting communities served by American Water through the 2025 Water and Environment Grant Program.
